text: William Nigel Ernle Bruce (4 February 1895 â€“ 8 October 1953) was a British actor. He was best known for his role of Dr. Watson in a movie series and in the radio series The New Adventures of Sherlock Holmes. He also appeared in Alfred Hitchcock movies Rebecca and Suspicion. Bruce died of a heart attack,Turner Classic Movies in Santa Monica, California at the age of 58. ==References== Category:1895 births Category:1953 deaths Category:British movie actors Category:British television actors Category:British stage actors Category:British radio actors Category:Actors from Hertfordshire Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
title: Nigel Bruce
